price: nípa ayé àti ọ̀run. Wọ́n ń bi ọ́ léèrè nípa àwọn ọmọ òrukàn. Sọ pé: “Ṣíṣe àtúnṣe dúkìá wọn (láì níí dà á pọ̀ mọ́ dúkìá yín) l’ó dára jùlọ. Tí ẹ bá sì dà á pọ̀ mọ́ dúkìá yín, ọmọ ìyá yín (nínú ẹ̀sìn) kúkú ni wọ́n. Allāhu sì mọ òbìlẹ̀jẹ́ yàtọ̀ sí alátùn-únṣe. Àti pé tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Allāhu bá fẹ́ (kí ẹ ya dúkìá wọn sí ọ̀tọ̀ nìkan ni) ìbá kó ìnira ba yín. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Alágbára, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.”
arabic: فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰۖ قُلۡ إِصۡلَاحٞ لَّهُمۡ خَيۡرٞۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمۡ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَعۡنَتَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wayasalūnaka ʿani al-yatāmā qul iṣ'lāḥun lahum khayrun wa-in tukhāliṭūhum fa-ikh'wānukum wal-lahu yaʿlamu al-muf'sida mina al-muṣ'liḥi walaw shāa al-lahu la-aʿnatakum inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
translations: surely He (could have) put you in difficulties
